results.title: The Birthday present
results.creator_credit: Ian Munro, Film Australia and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Johnson and friends”.
Johnson, a courageous pink elephant, leads his friends on a series of adventures. He is joined by Alfred, a leaky hot-water bottle, McDuff, a cheeky concertina, Diesel the dump truck and Squeaky the battered robot. The stories on this tape include: “The Birthday present”, “Playing games”, “Sharing”, “The Picnic”, “Windchimes” and “Cleaning day”.

results.title: To my dearest beloved one - Shewitey Mearey
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “I said to the doctor, I don’t care if I die tomorrow but I don’t want to leave my daughter alone. He said to me that first I had to live before I could have another child.”

results.title: Combination attacks
results.creator_credit: Don Kelly and Gerard Holdsworth Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Judo”.
In judo, combination attacks are very important in the application of tactics, and in their turn tactics play a part in competition. Combination attacks have more objectives than simple terminal throwing. One other obvious objective is to tire the opponent. If attach after attack is launched and every time the opponent has to avoid and by doing so moves into another attack, it can becomes very exhausting - both physically and mentally. Here are demonstrated ouchi-gari into uchi-mata, ouchi-gari into tai-otoshi, ouchi-mata into sutemi-waza and ne-waza combination.

results.title: The Awaited Messiah
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
This is the beginning of the story of the life of Jesus Christ, from the betrothal of Mary and Joseph; the Angel visits Mary; the wedding of Mary and Joseph and the unrest of young zealots.

results.title: Best of friends
results.creator_credit: Ian Munro, Film Australia and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Johnson and friends”.
Six stories featuring the courageous pink elephant and his friends who amongst the clutter in Michael’s bedroom. The stories are: “Beginnings”, “Under the bed”, “Best of friends”, “The Thing outside”, “Helpless”, and “Moving house”.

results.title: Extending the skill range
results.creator_credit: Don Kelly and Gerard Holdsworth Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Judo”.
Demonstrates various judo movements including uchimata, osotagake and their avoidances; straight and bent armlocks; randori as part of training.

results.title: Living not dying
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “For the past six years, I have been living with, not dying from, advanced breast cancer. My original diagnosis was in 1996, when I was 40 years old.”
results.description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “For the past six years, I have been living with, not dying from, advanced breast cancer. results.title: The Innocent condemned
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 12 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: in the garden of Gethsemane, Jesus talks to the Father; Judas betrays Jesus with a kiss; Jesus is arrested and taken away; Judas is given his money by Zerah; Jesus is taken before the high priest and questioned; Caiaphas is outraged by his answers; Peter denies Jesus three times; Judas is found hanged; Jesus is questioned by Pontius Pilate; Jesus is whipped by the soldiers; Jesus is mocked and crowned with thorns.

results.title: Further extensions to the skill range
results.creator_credit: Don Kelly and Gerard Holdsworth Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Judo”.
The object of the third film in this series is to show how the range can be enlarged still further while keeping to the same pattern of learning as the first two films. Training exercises, a strangle shown from the back of the opponent, more throws - Kouchi and Kosoto-gake, an introduction to sutemi-waza, and some free play are shown. Photographed by Don Kelly.

results.title: Dinosaur tracks
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Johnson and friends”.
Johnson and his friends get together in six stories. In “Diesel tries to fly” all the toys are put in danger as Diesal tries out his wings. Squeaky’s good at guarding the bedroom but what about the “Dinosaur tracks”? Is Johnson falling apart as the toys follow the mysterious “Pink thread.” “Melissa’s dinosaur”, Victoria is introduced to the toys. In “Diesel who?”, the toy loses his memory after a nasty crash. McDuff feels very superior after a visit to the toyshop, and the toys try to get her back to her old self in The Homecoming.
